content: free crochet pattern for jungle animal finger puppets my niece still plays with her farm animals from last year so this year i designed a whole new set of jungle animals for her birthday i m happy to share this expansion pack with everyone to make for their favorite littles or themselves left to right elephant lion monkey frog and wolf the pattern is designed to use small amounts of leftover yarn each animal will use about 1/5 of a small skein or ball
